pkgmetadata.longdescription: What=====Pythonic ZoneMinder wrapper- API- Event Server- Logger- Memory- Machine Learning ModulesDocumentation & Examples=========================Latest documentation is available here. The documentation includes a full example.Features=========- API auth using tokens or legacy (manages refresh logins automatically)- Monitors- Events with filters- States- Configs- EventNotification callbacks- Mapped Memory access- Direct access to ML algorithms- [Amazon Rekognition support](https://medium.com/@michael-ludvig/aws-rekognition-support-for-zoneminder-object-detection-40b71f926a80) for object detectionLimitations============* Only for Python3
